page.title: 02Customs
page.content: Customs Every June a{'Monklands Festival'}is held in our town.This creates the holiday atmosphere for the inhabitants especially the ones who cannot afford to go away. Many events are held in the open air e.g.sports,brassbands,fancydress, majorettes and showjumping.Others are held in local libraries and halls such as plays, reviews, talent contests, art displays etc. The streets are draped in colourful buntings and shopkeepers erect stalls full of tempting goods. A{'Festival Queen'}is picked from the pretty girls of the town and crowned by the Lord Provost.
